name: Attuned_Dominion_of_Arachnos_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to Terrorize the target and reduce their damage for 10 seconds and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will trigger roughly 4 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Soldiers of Arachnos and may be slotted into any Arachnos Soldier or Arachnos Widow damage power.
power_display_names: Dominion of Arachnos: Recharge/Chance for -Dmg and Terrorize
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for -DMG and Terrorize
